item.title: Report X-2024090010
item.description:
Report X-2024090010

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-05T09:13:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-21
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED HALFWAY INTO THE TRAILER. THE UNLOADER, STOPPED, LEFT THE AREA AND NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR. THE SUPERVISOR THEN CALLED FOR A DESIGNATED RESPONDER. THE RESPONDER, FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE INTO A SPILL TUBE. THE AREA WAS DECONTAMINATED FOLLOWING THE DECONTAMINATION CHECK LIST. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TRANAPORTED TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
